response.overview: When Chan Nari, a devoted mother and wife, visits her parents’ newly purchased home in a remote Cambodian province, she senses something is deeply wrong. The house, eerily shaped like a triangle, seems to whisper secrets of an unsettling past. As strange occurrences begin to plague her family—shadows shifting in the corners, whispers in the night—Nari encounters a mysterious woman who warns her that the land is cursed.  At first, Nari dismisses the warnings, but her skepticism turns to terror when she begins witnessing horrifying visions and unexplainable phenomena. Desperate for answers, she digs into the house’s history, uncovering a long-forgotten cult that once worshipped a dark deity. As the sinister presence tightens its grip, Nari realizes she has been marked—chosen for a ritual that demands her soul.
response.title: The Last Home

results.name: official trailer [ សាសនាងងឹត | The last home ]
